meanings.definition: To provide with new equipment or clothing.
meanings.sent1: The team is reoutfitting their gear for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reoutfit her wardrobe with trendy clothes.
meanings.sent3: After spilling coffee on his shirt, he had to reoutfit quickly before the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The old car was reoutfitted with state-of-the-art technology.
meanings.sent5: The knight reoutfitted his armor before heading into battle.

meanings.sent1: The hikers needed to reoutfit their backpacks for the longer trail.
meanings.sent2: The company had to reoutfit the office with new computers.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to reoutfit the kitchen after the mixer broke.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship was reoutfitted with extra fuel tanks for the long journey.
meanings.sent5: The explorer reoutfitted his expedition team with essential supplies.

meanings.sent1: The reoutfitting of the store was completed just in time for the grand opening.
meanings.sent2: The reoutfitting of the army base took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The sudden reoutfitting of the school's playground surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: The reoutfitting of the ship transformed it into a modern vessel.
meanings.sent5: The reoutfitting of the house included new furniture and decorations.
